synonyms: śrī-nṛsiṁha—Lord Nṛsiṁha; cakra—disc; padma—lotus; gadā—club; śaṅkha—conch; dhara—holding; janārdana—Lord Janārdana; padma—lotus; cakra—disc; śaṅkha—conch; gadā—club; kara—in the hands.
translation: "Lord Nṛsiṁha holds the disc, lotus, club and conch. Lord Janārdana holds the lotus, disc, conch and club.
